title: Zümrüdüanka
overview: Zümrüt's mother, Ülfet is a woman who constantly complains about the state of her daughter, as she wants her daughter to marry with good fortune, so they get rid of the infamous life they live in. Zümrüt, on the one hand, tries to deal with her pressures, on the other hand, she tries to hide the marriage proposal of Adil Bey, one of the heirs of Demirkan, from her mother.
